Description: Pottery sherd of vessel with inscription.
Curator's comments: The piece is included in A.H. Sayce, 'The Carian language and inscriptions' Transactions of the Royal Society of Biblical Archaeology 9, 1893, 153, pl. 3, V. A drawing had been shown to him by Petrie. It is discussed more recently by Alexander Herda; see Archaeologische Anzeiger 2009, 97, n.274 for full bibliography.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GS.298)
